descriptionHtml:
UPDATE- New version posted. It is compressed with 7zip so it should prevent NMM crashing issues, and it has a more logical recipe.

This is a re-texture of the Golden Rapier available at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11708,
made by mystic-hybrid and imported from Oblivion by badgremlin.

I re-textured it so that it looks less glossy and upped some of the stats- it now has about a 5th or 3rd more reach, crit chance, damage etc. Quite a decent weapon, and not unbalanced.

In addition, it can now be upgraded normally.

The weapon can be crafted like any elven sword.

Enjoy!

BookGuy

Note- the retexture isn\'t perfect; close examination will find a few speckles and spots of black on the sword. Sadly there isn\'t anything I can do about that, but the sword still looks great.
author: BookGuy
